introduction: Art of Darkness is a feature documentary intimately profiling controversial painter and performance artist Bryan Lewis Saunders. Bryan is renowned for his commitment to producing a self portrait every day, which, to date, number well over 10,000. A complex individual with admitted psychopathic tendencies, Bryan narrates his dark, complex process and the experiences that have shaped him and how he uses art to help tame his inner demons. Bryan's famed 'drug series' of self portraits while under the influence of a variety of mind-altering substances, has made him an Internet sensation garnering a legion of loyal fans worldwide.译：黑暗的艺术这部专题纪录片详细剖析了具有争议的画家和表演艺术家Bryan Lewis Saunders 布莱恩·刘易斯·桑德斯。布莱恩以每天画自画像而出名，到目前为止数量超过10,000张。布莱恩是一个复杂的个体并有承认有心理变态的倾向，他说他的黑暗与复杂的经历塑造了他，讲述了他是如何用艺术来帮助驯服他内心的恶魔。布莱恩著名的在不同毒品作用后的自画像“毒系列“已经使他在互联网拥有了世界各地的忠实粉丝团。
